Resolution: Circuit breaker appeared closed but was actually open. Reset circuit breaker, power restored.
Power cable was incorrectly connected at battery terminals. Rewired to battery disconnect properly, hub powered up.

Issue: Foot switch not turning boom on.
Resolution: In Wrench > Initial Setup > Configuration > Master Switch Input, changed setting from 12V to Ground.
Replace foot switch. (Temporary fix: change Master Switch Type to On-Screen to bypass defective switch.)
Update Hub software and perform factory reset.

Issue: P1 and P2 locked in blue, unable to change pressure settings.
Resolution: Update to current software.
Factory reset.
Selected alternate GPS option in setup; error resolved.
Wrong cabling used. Ordered and installed proper cable, GPS connection restored.

Issue: John Deere not mapping correctly, leaving gaps.
Resolution: Fence Row Nozzle Setup not configured correctly; reconfigured setup to fix mapping.

Issue: Section control not shutting off in waterways.
Resolution: Section control subscription on Deere display not activated. Activated subscription and function restored.
Plunger was missing spring; replaced plunger.
Cleaned contamination from plunger, restoring normal function.

Issue: PWM nozzle replaced with drip check, causing pressure to bleed off in boom when off.
Resolution: Turn Master Switch OFF when boom is off so all section valves close, preventing bleed-off.

Issue: Unable to get pressure above 40 psi.
Resolution: Plungers were worn; replaced plungers.
See valve support bulletin on www.capstanag.com/resources.

Issue: Coil circuit open error and valves not working.
Resolution: Replaced coil, corrected wiring issue, system restored.
Bad recirculation valve; replaced.

Issue: Recirculation valve faulty and opening when boom was on.
Resolution: Replaced faulty recirculation valve.
Recirculation valve spinning without motor stopping, returning flow to tank. Replaced recirculation valve.
Turn off recirculation valve.
Flush volume of 2 was entered, ending recirculation after 2 gallons passed through flowmeter. Set to 0 for continuous recirculation.

Issue: System not coming up on JD monitor.
Resolution: Hub lights on but not flashing. Replaced hub, system recognized on monitor.
Pinched extension harness; repaired harness, issue resolved.

Issue: Turn compensation and section control not working.
Resolution: Update to current software.

Issue: System would not respray previously applied areas.
Resolution: Update to current software.

Issue: After software update, valves not in correct order.
Resolution: Valves 5 and 87 plugged into wrong drop on VCM; corrected connections.
Update to current software.
Update to current software.
Factory reset PinPoint, unhook implement, and clear object pool in Pro 1200.

Issue: Boom would not turn on and spray.
Resolution: John Deere Gen 4 display had outdated software (2018). Updated display software and system function restored.
Replaced faulty flowmeter; error resolved.
Flowmeter harness connection corroded; repaired connection.
Updated Trimble ISOBUS screen; issue resolved.
Boom setup was incorrect; corrected setup restored shutoff function.
JD2630 only supported 13 sections; upgraded to JD Gen 5 display for individual nozzle control.

Issue: Recirculation button stays blue / stuck on
Resolution: Update to current software.

Issue: After 10–15 minutes of operation, the Capstan UT drops off / disconnects
Resolution: Reloaded software and cleared object pool.
Performed VCM orientation and mapped modules to correct boom locations.

Issue: Offsets change and turn compensation stops working after power cycle
Resolution: Ag Leader battery power not properly terminated.
Ag Leader automatic map legends must be unchecked / disabled.

Issue: P3 falling off ISOBUS when 4 or more boom sections turned on
Resolution: Loose CAN connection on armrest display.

Issue: Duty cycle on bar graph not consistent on sections 3 and 4
Resolution: CAN Channel 3 brown wire (key-switched) shorted to ground.

Issue: PP2 to PP3 upgrade: #5 VCM not turning on and losing settings
Resolution: VCM channels plugged into incorrect ports. No software restarts or factory resets were performed.
PP3 operating in manual pressure mode with high pressure. Corrected system to automatic pressure control.

Issue: Auto Swath not turning off sections
Resolution: Unchecked box for ECU lookaheads in Ag Leader.

Issue: Remote fill station shutting down after 3 seconds
Resolution: Update to current software.
Replaced with new nozzle assembly.
Fence row nozzle setup incorrect.
RS1 receiver requires Boom Ahead of Rear Axle measurement to be set to 0.
Navigate to Wrench > Flow > Flowmeter Setup > Specific Gravity 1.

Issue: Current gallon counter not displaying correct count
Resolution: Tap Gallons button. Select Current instead of Counter.
Corrected installation procedure; replaced damaged O-rings.
Pressure sensor reading incorrect. Verified wiring and replaced pressure sensor.

Issue: Folding booms cause system loss of communication
Resolution: Found and repaired pinched wire.

Issue: Voltage feedback through flowmeter port on hub
Resolution: Replace flowmeter and pressure sensor damaged due to improper winterization.

Issue: Rate 1 and Rate Rx both selected when machine starts up
Resolution: Immediate Fix: Click button to select only 1 field. Long-Term Fix: Update to current software.
Replaced extension; issue persisted. Replaced VCM and resolved issue.

Issue: Not mapping correctly on Ag Leader
Resolution: Ag Leader mapping flier point issue causing map zoom problem.

Issue: Constant “Solution Pump Dry” alarm on John Deere
Resolution: Disabled / removed JDRC and switchbox.
Damaged plunger and O-ring.
Performed software restart; issue resolved.
Valve open on strainer. Close valve.
Example: Red #4 nozzle is entered as 4.0, not 0.4.

Issue: GPS speed issues after updating Viper display
Resolution: Update to current software.
Recirculation valve open due to incorrect settings. Go Wrench > Boom/Nozzle > Recirculation Valve > Normally Closed.
Correct fence row nozzle setup.
Disconnected extra Bluetooth devices and reinstalled software.

Issue: Fence row nozzles not turning on
Resolution: Update to current software.

Issue: Error not clearing when cycling key
Resolution: Software restart required to clear error.
Operator not selecting Rate Rx on Capstan screen; corrected setup.
Update to current software and enter correct John Deere display settings.

Issue: Coil circuit open even with new coil installed
Resolution: Shifted VCM drop down one position to unused port; error cleared.
Viper not orienting quickly enough out of corners. Turn on AccuBoom override.
Disable Compass. Go Wrench > Navigation > Compass > Disable.

Issue: Blown fuse on Boom 1 extension harness
Resolution: Replaced damaged fuse; restored operation.

Issue: VCM showing ghost valves (valves not installed)
Resolution: Replaced VCM; issue resolved.
Update to current software.

Issue: Sections not turning on coming out of corner
Resolution: Disable Compass. Go Wrench > Navigation > Compass > Disable.
Clear contamination from coil.

Issue: Recirculation valve not working with display button
Resolution: Update to current software.

Issue: Duty cycle very low but maintaining target rate
Resolution: Incorrect tip size selected; corrected tip configuration.

Issue: Rate and pressure unstable after software update
Resolution: Tuned pressure first, then rate; operation stabilized.

Issue: PP3 not pulling up on UT; all LED lights solid
Resolution: No boot code in hub. Replaced hub.
Factory reset hub; initialized accelerometer via Wrench > Navigation > Gyro.
Replaced plungers, reduced pressure, corrected nozzle size entry.
See valve bulletin TB24-02 SpitFire Coil Internal Leaks.
Flowmeter error reporting 100%. Flowmeter not working.
Disabled compass; issue resolved.
Replaced chassis harness due to faulty CAN wires.
Adjust Maximum TC Sections to correct number.

Issue: P1/P2 and pump showing all blue on display
Resolution: Clear Object Pool on VT.
Enter correct nozzle size and clear contamination from flowmeter.
Factory reset not performed; reset and completed setup.

Issue: Fault 51 Drop 8 Power Short (nothing plugged in)
Resolution: Replace hub; internal hub fault.
Replace extension harness.

Issue: PP3 falls off CAN repeatedly after key cycle
Resolution: Loose ground nut on chassis ground block; tightened connection.

Issue: Softboom error: valves 2–81 displaying on Softboom 12
Resolution: Clear Object Pool and delete implement on VT. Factory reset PP3 and perform setup.
Plungers deformed from improper grinding; replaced plungers.
